problem_text_cn: 如图,已知平行四边形ABCD的面积为24cm²,E为AB的中点,连接DE,则△ODE的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the area of ​​the parallelogram ABCD is N_0^2, E is the midpoint of AB, and DE is connected, then the area of ​​△ODE is ()
raw_answer: 解:由题意得,S~△ABC~=\frac{1}{2}S~平行四边形ABCD~=12cm²,∵E为AB的中点,∴S~△BED~=\frac{1}{2}~△ABD~=6cm²,又∵O是BD的中点,∴S~△OED~=\frac{1}{2}S~△BED~=3cm²．故选:A．
